local_intent: Perceive red_plate, move above and align, place white plate at place_pose with light press, verify contact, release and retreat.
assumptions: place_pose key is present on the blackboard (set by prior detection/SetBlackboard)
camera can detect 'red_plate' from current pose
gripper and arm are operational and have space to retreat
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase of the global plan: detects the red plate, moves above and aligns, executes PlaceAt using the blackboard place_pose with a light press, verifies contact, opens gripper to release, and retreats â€” matching the GLOBAL_BT sequence and task description.
